Articles.Content: The 1.2.1 dv chart on the wiki says that you can go from LKO to Dres flyby with around 1500 dv plus 1000 dv plane change, but other launch window planners etc. give about a minimum of around 3500 dv. Is the chart incorrect, or do I need a gravity assist somewhere to get there in 2500 dv?
Never mind, the launch window planner includes the insertion burn. Didn't notice that.
